title: Rugby- Ireland team to face England in Six Nations
text: March 15, 2018 / 1:54 PM / Updated an hour ago Rugby - Ireland team to face England in Six Nations Reuters Staff 1 Min Read DUBLIN (Reuters) - Ireland coach Joe Schmidt on Thursday named the following team to face England in the Six Nations at Twickenham on Saturday. Rugby Union - Six Nations Championship - Ireland vs Scotland - Aviva Stadium, Dublin, Republic of Ireland - March 10, 2018 Ireland head coach Joe Schmidt before the match REUTERS/Clodagh Kilcoyne 15-Rob Kearney, 14-Keith Earls, 13-Garry Ringrose, 12-Bundee Aki, 11-Jacob Stockdale, 10-Johnny Sexton, 9-Conor Murray; 8-CJ Stander, 7-Dan Leavy, 6-Peter Oâ€™Mahony, 5-Iain Henderson, 4-James Ryan, 3-Tadhg Furlong, 2-Rory Best (captain), 1-Cian Healy. Replacements: 16-Sean Cronin, 17-Jack McGrath, 18-Andrew Porter, 19-Devin Toner, 20-Jordi Murphy, 21-Kieran Marmion, 22-Joey Carbery, 23-Jordan Larmour. Reporting by Padraic Halpin, editing by Mitch Phillips
